register-description: Join Shark and start managing your account in a few seconds.
phone-number-placeholder: Your phone number with country code no.
nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters long
phoneMin: Phone number must be at least 10 characters long
locationMin: Location must be at least 2 characters long
passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
sign-in-description: Sign in to continue to your Shark account.
minimum-code-is-6-characters: Code must be at least 6 characters long
password-must-be-at-least-8-characters-l: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password-must-contain-at-least-one-upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password-must-contain-at-least-one-lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password-must-contain-at-least-one-numbe: Password must contain at least one number
password-must-contain-at-least-one-speci: Password must contain at least one special character (@, $, !, %, *, ?, &)
hero-title: Buy, Sell, and Invest in Profitable Online Businesses
hero-description: The most trusted marketplace for verified digital assets in the Middle East
search-placeholder: Search for SaaS, E-commerce, Content websites...
service-description: Explore the latest services available on Shark Market.
why-shark-market-desc: Built for serious buyers and sellers in the region.
f1-description: Access listings reviewed by our team.
f3-description: Insights and data to close deals quicker.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.intro: Shark Market is a specialized platform for buying and selling digital projects and assets in the region, and building clear investment partnerships. We offer a professional experience that combines listing quality, information clarity, and transaction security—so you reach the right party with confidence and speed.
whoWeAre.verifyData-1: Review core project metrics (revenue, traffic, expenses, channels).
whoWeAre.verifyData-2: Initial documentation of documents and performance data before negotiation.
whoWeAre.verifyData-3: Clear information to help you make your decision with confidence.
whoWeAre.directSupport-1: A team that helps you prepare your listing in a professional format.
whoWeAre.directSupport-2: Guidance for buyers on comparing, reading the numbers, and understanding risks.
whoWeAre.directSupport-3: A fast communication channel to respond to inquiries.
whoWeAre.preserveRights-1: High privacy and protection of sensitive data.
whoWeAre.preserveRights-2: Secure steps for negotiation and closing the agreement.
whoWeAre.preserveRights-3: Reducing fraud through clear policies and standards.

trust-prot-desc: KYC verification, escrow, and transaction safeguards.
hero-cta-desc: Create your account and explore verified listings.

categories.heading: What business category best describes your asset?
categories.ecommerce-description: Sell any Ecommerce Business or Asset
categories.mobile-app-description: Sell your iOS or Android App
categories.youtube-social-description: Sell any Youtube Channel, Social Media Account or Newsletter
categories.other-description: Sell any other business or asset

sell.tell-us-description: We need a few key details to get started.

form.operations-date: When did your business begin operations?
form.industry: Which industry do you operate in?
form.site-type: What type of site is this?
form.annual-revenue: What was your annual revenue over the past 12 months?

income-sources.heading: How do you make money?
income-sources.subtitle: Check any that apply.
income-sources.ads-description: You are selling blank or available sections of your website for ad hosting. Includes ads, sponsored content, and videos.
income-sources.affiliate-description: You earn a commission for marketing another person's or company's products on your site. Includes partnerships with influencers, bloggers, and email lists.
income-sources.services-description: You earn money by directly selling services you provide, on a one-time or recurring basis. Includes both labor and software services (SaaS).
income-sources.other-description: You earn money from other methods not described above.

browseListing.no-listings: No verified listings match your filters.

featuredProjects.sales-history-heading: Projects with a distinctive sales history

heroMarketplace.subline1: Search now for your suitable opportunity among

interests.title: What would you like to do?
interests.sellCardDesc: Publish your listing with a step-by-step wizard and verified data.
interests.browseCardDesc: Compare high-quality opportunities with clear data and professional filters.
interests.partnerCardDesc: Connect with investors, co-founders, and operators across the region.

needHelp.title: Need Help?
needHelp.description: We understand that buying or selling a digital business isn't easy. If you have any questions or require assistance, feel free to contact us anytime.
needHelp.supportDesc: Search our knowledge base for answers to common questions.
needHelp.guideDesc: Learn how we can help you buy and sell online businesses.

singleService.share-subtitle: Share this opportunity with whom you want
singleService.interested-cta: Interested in this listing? Reveal seller contact to get in touch.

expertContact.title: Talk to a Shark expert
expertContact.description: Have questions about this listing? Our experts are ready to help you make the right decision and evaluate the opportunity professionally.
expertContact.name: Name

footer.tagline: A specialized platform for buying, selling, and investing in digital projects across the Middle East.
